rounds.comments: (Alex: Then, we'll give the actor and the quote, you name the movie...)

clues.text:
Humphrey Bogart:
"If you kill me, how are you going to get the bird?"

Voice of Evelyn Venable:
"A boy who won't be good might just as well be made of wood"

Jimmy Stewart:
"Attaboy, Clarence"

Edmund Gwenn:
"Just because every child can't get his wish, that doesn't mean there isn't a Santa Claus"

Gregory Peck:
"Anti-Semitism... what can I possibly say that hasn't been said before?"

rounds.comments: (Alex: "M-E" coming up in each correct response, of course.)
